data.title: About: Barbarossa (film)
data.meta_description: Barbarossa (also released as Barbarossa: Siege Lord or Sword of War) is a 2009 Italian English-language film set primarily in northern Italy during the late 12th century. Despite the film's title, Friedrich "Barbarossa" features only as a supporting character in this film, which is primarily concerned with the struggle of the Lombard League, which struggled to maintain independence from the Holy Roman Empire, led by the legendary Guelph warrior Alberto da Giussano.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Barbarossa ist ein italienischer Film des Regisseurs Renzo Martinelli aus dem Jahr 2009 und basiert auf dem biographischen Buch „Federico Barbarossa e Beatrice di Borgogna“ von aus demselben Jahr. Die Uraufführung fand am 2. Oktober 2009 in Mailand, Italien, statt. (de)

Barbarossa (also released as Barbarossa: Siege Lord or Sword of War) is a 2009 Italian English-language film set primarily in northern Italy during the late 12th century. Despite the film's title, Friedrich "Barbarossa" features only as a supporting character in this film, which is primarily concerned with the struggle of the Lombard League, which struggled to maintain independence from the Holy Roman Empire, led by the legendary Guelph warrior Alberto da Giussano. This film was co-written and directed by Renzo Martinelli. It has been released on DVD in the United States under the title Sword of War, and elsewhere under the title Barbarossa: Siege Lord. (en)

Barbarossa est un film italien réalisé par Renzo Martinelli en 2009, avec Rutger Hauer et Cécile Cassel. Il a été diffusé la première fois en France sur France 4 le 2 avril 2011 sous le titre Barberousse, l'Empereur de la mort. Le tournage a eu lieu en Roumanie, à Alba Iulia, Bucarest et Hunedoara. (fr)

Barbarossa è un film del 2009 diretto da Renzo Martinelli, uscito nelle sale italiane il 9 ottobre 2009 e liberamente tratto dal libro Federico Barbarossa e Beatrice di Borgogna. Re e regina d'Italia di Federico A. Rossi di Marignano. (it)

《스워드 오브 워》(Barbarossa)는 2009년 공개된 의 영화이다. (ko)

Barbarossa: Klątwa przepowiedni (tytuł oryg. Barbarossa) – włoski film kostiumowy z 2009 roku w reżyserii Renzo Martinelli. Wyprodukowany przez 01 Distribuzione. (pl)

«Барбаросса» (другое название — «Барбаросса. Проклятие пророчества») (англ. Barbarossa, итал. Barbarossa) — итальянский исторический фильм режиссёра , снятый в 2009 году. Мировая премьера состоялась 2 октября 2009 года. (ru)
